titleStmt.title: Observations on the four letters of Dr. John Wallis concerning the Trinity and the Creed of Athanasius
titleStmt.author: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719.

notesStmt.note: Written by Stephen Nye. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
This item also appears at reel 344:13 as part of: The faith of one God. London, 1691 (Wing F258B).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
